about_the_game:
Axom: Conquest is a base building resource managing tower defense game set on the dangerous planet named Axom.

Gather resources to build defenses, unlock research between games to get stronger and ultimately unlock the secrets of the mysterious planet.

Features

  • Infinitely repayable procedurally generated levels - Each mission is different

  • Build your base - Construct towers, walls and hazards to defend your all important Nexus Drill from the hoards of Centurax trying to destroy it!

  • Wave based combat - Prepare and build in advance, then start the Nexus Drill, alerting all enemies in the area. Each wave the challenge grows stronger until you are ultimately defeated.

  • Gather resources - Gather from the ground, build refineries on resource nodes scattered around the map, but defend them well to keep your income stream safe!

  • Upgrade and research - Every building can be upgraded to vastly improve it's performance. Complete upgrades at research buildings to keep up with the ever growing threat of the Centurax

  • Every game you get stronger - Collect research while in game to complete research aboard your ship which provide permanent advantages for each subsequent game

  • Unlock new advanced structures - Dozens of buildings, towers and hazards to unlock as well as branching paths for tower upgrades

  • Unlock Building Equipment - Advanced equipment that can be equipped by every building type

Build your perfect defence

______________________________________________________________

Story

In the depths of space lies Axom, a planet overflowing with resources, a treasure trove for any daring enough to claim it. But you’re not the first to try.

You are an independent miner with your heart set on riches. 

Standing between you and those untold riches is the Centurax, a relentless alien force guarding their world with unending ferocity. Alone, you’ll face wave after wave, fighting for survival as you strip the planet of its bounty.

Yet as you dig deeper, the true purpose behind the Centurax’s defence begins to emerge, revealing a mystery buried in the planet’s core.
